title: "dplyr II"
output: github_document

```{r}
library(gapminder)
```

```{r, eval=F, include=F}
dir <- "gapminder_data_files"
unlink(dir, recursive = T)
dir.create(dir)

gapminder %>% 
  split(.$continent) %>% 
  map2(., names(.), ~{
    
    data <- .x 
    name <- .y 
    
    path <- glue::glue("{dir}/{name}.csv")
    readr::write_tsv(data, path = path)
  })
```
